title: NLP and HCI: A Review of the Literature

These articles cover a range of topics related to human-computer interaction, natural language processing, and AI, including the role of HCI in the development of AI systems, the design of intelligent user interfaces, the role of HCI in the design of intelligent virtual assistants, and the future of HCI in the age of AI
note: They provide valuable insights and perspectives on the interactions between humans and AI, and the role of HCI in facilitating these interactions.<|endoftext|>
